author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-8307] Improving the Histogram class to work fine in underload case
Summary: Add a list to store and serve the percentile metrics when the load under a default load. This will help in avoiding the roundoff errors in the cases with low samples.
Test Plan: Unit test. Test on Shadow.

author: tabish
msg: Allow purge to disable message expiration check when paging in Messages to be purged.  Avoids attempts at sending messages to a DLQ during a purge operation and in firing advisory messages for expired messages which are being thrown out by request.

author: mamta
msg: DERBY-6045 (in list multi-probe by primary key not chosen on tables with >256 rows)

author: hboutemy
msg: fixed ITs: maven-reporting-exec imports Aether (both Sonatype and Eclipse) into m-site-p classloader, which disturbs maven-dependency-tree Maven version detection algorithm (based on availability of such classes)
